text:
Organizations today manage vast
data lakes with millions
or even trillions of objects in Amazon S3.
Data fuels analytics, machine learning, and AI.
It's the essence of modern business.

But as data grows, finding the right data
becomes a challenge.

Customers either don't know what data
they have or spend months

to years building complex metadata systems
that are hard to maintain
and keep current.

Introducing Amazon S3 metadata
to accelerate data discovery with near

real time rich object metadata stored in
fully managed S3 tables.

S3 metadata is designed to automatically
refresh the metadata tables to reflect

the latest changes as objects are added
to and removed from your bucket.

With S3 metadata, you can locate
and utilize the right data, allowing teams

to focus on putting your data to work
instead of organizing it.

Built on open source technology,
S3 metadata is designed to be compatible

with a wide range of AWS and third party
engines and applications.
with no new software to learn
You can just use your existing tools.
Transform data discovery

with Amazon S3 metadata,
so you can understand all the data

you have and quickly
find it for use in business analytics.

Content retrieval, AI, ML model
training, and more.
Unlock the full potential of your data.
Get started with Amazon S3 metadata today.
